493:1: tatra punarapi bhagavān candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma-bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra atīte'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipularaiprameyairacintyairaparimāṇairyadāsīt |
493:2: tena kālena tena samayena abhāvasamudgato nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
493:3: tat kiṃ manyase kumāra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato'bhāvasamudgata ityucyate ?
493:4: sa khalu punaḥ kumāra tathāgato jātamātra evoparyantarīkṣe saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgamya sapta padāni prakramitvā imāmevaṃrūpāṃ vācamabhāṣata-abhāvasamudgatāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
493:6: tena ca kumāra śabdena trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ svareṇābhivijñapto'bhūt |
493:7: tatra bhaumān devānupādāya yāvad brahmalokaṃ paraṃparayā śabdamudīrayāmāsuḥ ghoṣamanuśrāvayāmāsuḥ-abhāvasamudgato batāyaṃ tathāgato bhaviṣyati,
493:8: yo jātamātra evoparyantarīkṣe saptatālamātramabhyudgamya sapta padāni prakramitvā abhāvaśabdamudīrayati |
493:9: iti hyabhāvasamudgato'bhāvasamudgata iti tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyamudapādi |
493:10: tasya ca bhagavato bodhiprāptasya sarvavṛkṣapatrebhyaḥ sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatibhyaḥ sarvaśailaśikharebhyaścābhāvasamudgataśabdo niścarati |
493:11: yāvati ca tatra lokadhātau śabdaprajñaptiḥ sarvato'bhāvasamudgatavijñaptiśabdo niścarati |
493:12: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tasya bhagavato'bhāvasamudgatasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane mahākaruṇācintī nāma rājakumāro'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ |
493:13: atha khalu kumāra sa mahākaruṇācintī nāma rājakumāro yena bhagavān abhāvasamudgatastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastenosaṃkrāmat |
493:14: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte'sthāt ||
493:15: atha khalu kumāra sa bhagavān abhāvasamudgatastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahākaruṇācintino rājakumārasyādhyāśayaṃ viditvā imaṃ samādhiṃ deśayāmāsa |
493:16: atha khalu kumāra sa mahākaruṇācintī rājakumāraḥ imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ prasīdati sma |
493:17: prasannacittaśca keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajito'bhūt |
493:19: udgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyukto vyahārṣīt |
493:20: sa tainaiva kuśalamūlena viṃśatikalpakoṭyo na jātu durgativinipātamagamat |
493:22: suvicintitārtho nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi |
493:23: sarveṣu ca teṣu kalpeṣu viśatiṃ ca buddhakoṭīrārāgayāmāsa |
493:24: paśya kumāra yathāyaṃ samādhirbahukaro bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarasya buddhajñānasya paripūraṇāya saṃvartate ||
493:25: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata-
493:43: sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ |
493:54: sa co jino āśayu jñātva dhīraḥ
493:56: śrutvā ca so imu virajaṃ samādhiṃ
